answers.answer: I only had one ultrasound with my first pregnancy.  It depends on how your pregnancy is going, but the 20 week ultrasound is the only REQUIRED one normally.  Your doctor or midwife might recommend more though, so I would just see what they think.
Yea it normally depends on ur doc. And how ur pregnancy is going. With my first I had three. With this one I'm 30 weeks and have had 3 so far
I'm almost 22 week pregnant and I have done my ultrasound 1 month ago and I'm pregnant with twins should I go for ultrasound or I should wait

Depends on your doctor and insurance. With my first the doctor i had gave one every appt. With my second i switched doctors and they only do 2. 1 for dating in the beginning and one for 20 week anatomy. I had more at the end becaise i had gestational diabetes but if everything is normal only 2.
I only had 3 and I made sure they were 3 really good ones
I've had 6 scans but only because I've miscarried 6 times before this pregnancy. Normally you have one at about 12 weeks, then around 20 weeks and then one last one around 35 weeks.
I had it twice but just because baby was 1 week behind, otherwise they make 1 scan at 20 th week in all pregnancy where they check everything
The only time you will have monthly Ultra Sounds is high risk pregnancies.
